STATE notmoving
	EVENT gochopper (moving, chopperonway)
	BEGIN
		0
		0
	END

	EVENT DAMAGE (dead, chopdestroyed)
	BEGIN
		0
		1
		2
		3

STATE slowdown
	EVENT DAMAGE (dead, chopdestroyed)
	BEGIN

		77

		95
		96	GOTO landing

	END


STATE landing
	EVENT DAMAGE (dead, chopdestroyed)
	EVENT leave (takeoff, spinup)
	BEGIN

		97

		99
		100

	BEGIN
		0
		0
		0 	GOTO notmoving
	END

	EVENT gochopper (moving, -)
	BEGIN
		0
		0
	END

	BEGIN
		0
